text: khux brrda phu thi klaw wa xo phracea hæng phwk kha phraxngkh thæcring phwk kha phraxngkh sraththa kan læw pord thrng xphaythosʹ hı kæ phwk kha phraxngkh dwy theid sung brrda khwam phid khxng phwk kha phraxngkh læa pord di thrng pxngkan phwk kha phraxngkh hı phn cak kar lngthosʹ hæng fi nrk dwy
